H0.text: Sonar is a navigation technology that works on the same principle as echolocation.

H1.text: Radar is a navigation technology that works on the same principle as echolocation.

H2.text: GPS is the navigation technology that works on the same principle as echolocation.

H3.text: Topography is the navigation technology that works on the same principle as echolocation.

A4.text: Sonar is a technique that uses sound propagation to navigate.

A5.text: Sonar may also be used for robot navigation.
